DataElement.preferredName: Patient Human Immunodeficiency Virus Infectious Disorder Current Effective Antiretroviral Therapy With Undetectable Viral Load Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator of whether of not patient with known Human Immunodeficiency Virus taking effective anti-retroviral therapy has an undetectable viral load.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Human Immunodeficiency Virus Infectious Disorder Current Effective Antiretroviral Therapy With Undetectable Viral Load Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._The virus isolated and recognized as the etiologic agent of AIDS. HIV-1 is classified as a lentivirus, a subtype of retroviruses._A disorder resulting from the presence and activity of a microbial, viral, fungal, or parasitic agent. It can be transmitted by direct or indirect contact._Occurring in or belonging to the present time._Existing in fact and ready for service._Treatment of retroviral infections with medications that target the virus directly, limiting the ability of infected cells to produce new virus particles._Used to indicate the presence of something or someone._The inability to be noticed, identified or discovered._The number of viral particles (usually HIV) in a sample of blood plasma._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Human Immunodeficiency Virus Infectious Disorder Current Effective Antiretroviral Therapy With Undetectable Viral Load Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: The virus isolated and recognized as the etiologic agent of AIDS. HIV-1 is classified as a lentivirus, a subtype of retroviruses.:A disorder resulting from the presence and activity of a microbial, viral, fungal, or parasitic agent. It can be transmitted by direct or indirect contact.:Occurring in or belonging to the present time.:Existing in fact and ready for service.:Treatment of retroviral infections with medications that target the virus directly, limiting the ability of infected cells to produce new virus particles.:Used to indicate the presence of something or someone.:The inability to be noticed, identified or discovered.:The number of viral particles (usually HIV) in a sample of blood plasma.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: The virus isolated and recognized as the etiologic agent of AIDS. HIV-1 is classified as a lentivirus, a subtype of retroviruses.
A disorder resulting from the presence and activity of a microbial, viral, fungal, or parasitic agent. It can be transmitted by direct or indirect contact.
Occurring in or belonging to the present time.
Existing in fact and ready for service.
Treatment of retroviral infections with medications that target the virus directly, limiting the ability of infected cells to produce new virus particles.
Used to indicate the presence of something or someone.
The inability to be noticed, identified or discovered.
The number of viral particles (usually HIV) in a sample of blood plasma.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/not applicable.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or not applicable.

Concepts.longName: Yes, No, or Not Applicable Response
Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or not applicable.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 04-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 8/3/2015 Corrections made to VD in order to restore to original format: removed C49486 as rep term and replaced with C49797; restored long name and definition per Dianne Reeves/tt.

ReferenceDocuments.name: PQT
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient with known Human Immunodeficiency Virus (HIV) taking effective anti-retroviral therapy and has an undetectable viral load?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Alliance Alt Question Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: If Yes, is the patient on effective anti-retroviral therapy with undetectable load within 6 months of registration?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CCTG_01
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient with known Human Immunodeficiency Virus (HIV), taking effective anti-retroviral therapy and has an undetectable viral load within 6 months of enrollment.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CCTG_02
ReferenceDocuments.description: HIV-infected participant has an effective anti-retroviral therapy with undetectable viral load within 6 months prior to enrollment.

DataElement.administrativeNotes: 4/12/23 Created v. 2.0 of this CDE due to changing long name of CDE to reflect concepts used, added human readable def for CCTG. Done during cleanup activities cjl.
